dcterms:description: A report on how social networks are assisting Indian farmers during the coronavirus lockdowns, highlighting the role of social media in connecting farmers with customers.
dcterms:title: How Social Networks Are Helping Indian Farmers Hit By the Coronavirus Lockdowns

dcterms:description: A study examining the role of social media during the Arab Spring, focusing on how it influenced political changes.
dcterms:title: Opening closed regimes: what was the role of social media during the arab spring?
